pages.text: There are many different variations of steel, but the variation I should use is a composition of 75% carbon from coal and 25% iron. I can give this distribution into a $(thing)crucible$() over a fire to yield 1 crucible steel ingot.
Crucible steel is still steel after all, so I can use it for much more stronger tools and parts. I do hope that I'll be able to make a much stronger steel in the future.
